reviewText: This is a fun movie for all ages. The antics that go on in this movie just has you in stitches. suitable for the very young and adults alike.

If you've never seen Nick Park's original Wallace & Gromit movies, you're missing the best claymation ever created.  If you've only seen Chicken Run, you're missing the "roots" of Nick Park.  The original movies are each about 30 minutes long, so they're perfect for little people.  But big people will be just as entertained, intrigued by the intricacies of the characters, the scenes, and the storylines.  A must have set for sure...
